<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get an invitation link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/users/invite/{employeeType}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns an invitation link for joining the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"employeeType","in":"path","description":"Employee type (User or Visitor)","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["All","User","Visitor"],"description":"[0 - All, 1 - User, 2 - Visitor]"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Invitation link","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
